name: Paul Johnston - current focus: moving electrons

content.html: I know I've been *that* person on more than one occasion. But I think it's been really hard to try to be a part of something this year where many tech people have a high opinion of themselves. The number of times I've been asked "why can't we do this with containers?"
content.value:
I know I've been *that* person on more than one occasion.

But I think it's been really hard to try to be a part of something this year where many tech people have a high opinion of themselves.

The number of times I've been asked "why can't we do this with containers?"
